section.name: FontSets Component Information
section.description: This section contains general illustrations component information.

setting.description: This list contains all the valid font set ID codes that can be used for this component type.

setting.name: In Binding List
setting.description: Flag if this component is to be added to the binding list. Not all components need to be in that list.

setting.description: The shaping engine to be used for this typeface.

setting.name: Features
setting.description: The features that will be used for this typeface.

setting.description: Request any modifications for this typeface such as bolding.

setting.description: Specify a file that might contain any character mapping modifications.
